reviews.review: У меня мощный компьютер, но я играю в CS:GО только из-за того, что эта игра отлична построена на балансе.
I am a competetive rank of Bronze -1 and I absolutely love this game. Must buy!
игра супер мне нравится есть кейсы но нет ключей)))
Мне очень понравилась эта игра.Из-за чего?Во первых из-за множества карт и режимов.Есть возможность открывать кейсы,играть с друзьями.Всем рекомендую эту игру.
Самый лучший шутер в который я играл!

[UPDATED 2020]

The updates are okay, i enjoy Wingman the most, if you don't know what wingman is, it's basically a 2v2 game mode with ranks as you would get in normal 5v5. The only downside is that you gotta buy to upgrade you're account in order to not play with hackers which is called "prime status" unless you had the game before they did the update which in that case you would automatically have it.
Um dos melhores jogos de fps :)
it was a great game till they updated it and deranked twice in one day, stupidest game update ever
Awesome game.  Been playing cs since the start.  And this is the best one since.  Of course i think 1.6 is classic.  But this is  an upgraded cs that i am very happy with way more than source
Игра хорошая, но если вы попались с поляками (кроме ВП) в одной тиме, то это слитая катка.
ที่สุดแห่งการ "ยิง"
I used to play CS 1.6 when I was young. Now I'm into CS:GO and Im really enjoying it
Muito bom vey ! HELLOCO.. NTC slc bom até demais

Most I've ever yelled at a computer screen.

10/10
Need More Skill!! Need More Skill!! :3

Installed game
shot chicken
got no scoped by awper
10/10 would get no scoped again
alot of replay value, so so ranking system would be better if it were not so easy to smurf. but hey just makes you get better quicker right?
Joined the game, chased the chicken, killed it, GG

this game to me is true art if you like spending nights ignoring hw and staying up till dawn this is the game for you. 


pro tip :watch your wallet, it might vanish before your eyes/ also dont buy guns that are any worse quality then "field tested"
CS:GO is the best game ever MADE
i paid full price for this game and i will not work at ALL. DO NOT BUY

its definately a good game 
i love this

MUST HaVE GAME 
all i have to say 
you can even make money LOL
This game is super fun and very addicting. I find this game awesome. This is worth the price. 10/10 :D
Best game ever..... so addicting learn something new everyday
I give it an 8/8 g8 m8s.
Really good game, made the Zeus death sound effect my notification ringtone.
Apparently i did not review this game in my library so 5.6/5.6 on the ryan mccraffery scale
Muito bom o jogo, só acho que os gráficos são muito ultrapassados.
jogo muito viciante o ruim e o dinheiro gasto em skins
Great game, just needs 128 tick servers and less bugs! :D
The amount of cheaters playing competitive make this game nearly impossible to enjoy.
Oynanması gereken ve bağımlılık yapan gelmiş geçmiş en iyi CS!!
This is a pretty great game, you can play for hours without getting bored!
More fun than pulling your own teeth out with your bare hands. But then again the same can be said for a savage beating from a man in a mascot costum.
It is a great game. Much more realistic than "COD". You have to earn money in competitive and save for weapons and gear. Kills and recoil are very realistic.
